turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a pizza from Roma pizza please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, would that be a pick up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will pick up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want their supreme pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which size? They have small, medium, large, or extra large.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How big is the extra large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's 21 inches.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wow, that's big! And the large?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Large is 18 inches.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay I'll take large.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can we request jalapeno instead of green peppers?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, of course. I will request jalapeno instead of green peppers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, and extra cheese?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so that's a large supreme with jalapeno instead of green peppers and extra cheese?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your pizza will be ready in 25 minutes for pick up.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You are welcome. Enjoy your pizza!
